trans-unit.resname: HOU·200 | Nissa, Genesis Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−10]: Look at the top ten cards of your library. You may put any number of creature and/or land cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: −10：检视你牌库顶的十张牌。你可以将其中任意数量的生物和／或地牌放进战场。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: HOU·201 | Avid Reclaimer | Card Name
HOU·201 | Avid Reclaimer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} or {U}. If you control a Nissa planeswalker, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}或{U}到你的法术力池中。如果你操控妮莎鹏洛客，则你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: HOU·202 | Brambleweft Behemoth | Card Name
HOU·202 | Brambleweft Behemoth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏（此生物攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）

trans-unit.resname: HOU·203 | Nissa's Encouragement | Card Name
HOU·203 | Nissa's Encouragement | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library and graveyard for a card named Forest, a card named Brambleweft Behemoth, and a card named Nissa, Genesis Mage. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库和坟墓场中搜寻一张名称为树林的牌，一张名称为纺棘贝西摩斯的牌，以及一张名称为创生法师妮莎的牌。展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: HOU·205 | Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver | Card Name
HOU·205 | Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+3]: Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.
trans-unit.target: +3：对每位对手而言，除非该牌手牺牲一个非地永久物或弃一张牌，否则便失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: HOU·205 | Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Destroy target creature. Draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: HOU·205 | Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−11]: CARDNAME deals 7 damage to each opponent. You draw seven cards.
trans-unit.target: −11：欺瞒神龙尼可波拉斯向每位对手各造成7点伤害。你抓七张牌。

HOU·206 | Wasp of the Bitter End | Card Text | Paragraph 1
HOU·206 | Wasp of the Bitter End | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a Bolas planeswalker spell, you may sacrifice CARDNAME. If you do, destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放波拉斯鹏洛客咒语时，你可以牺牲终焉蜂群。若你如此作，则消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.target: {4}{R}：法老神狂信者向目标对手造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: HOU·208 | Visage of Bolas | Card Name
HOU·208 | Visage of Bolas | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当波拉斯尊容进战场时，你可以从你的牌库和／或坟墓场中搜寻一张名称为欺瞒神龙尼可波拉斯的牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。如果你以此法搜寻你的牌库，则将它洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: HOU·208 | Visage of Bolas | Card Text | Paragraph 2
